a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths from diarrheal diseases of people 70 and older by risk factor,
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
Note: Risk factors can interact and overlap for a given cause of death; therefore the sum of deaths attributed to risk factors will exceed the total
number of deaths from diarrheal diseases.
